overview: Fury Pro Grappling 6 was a grappling event that took place on Friday, December 30, 2022 at the old ECW Arena in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The show will be main evented by a womenâ€™s super fight at 135 as UFC flyweight Gillian Robertson takes on former UFC strawweight champion Rose Namajunas at 135 pounds. The co-main event will also pit UFC fighters against each other in a grappling setting as UFC featherweight riser Chase Hooper battles UFC Hall of Famer Clay Guida at 175 pounds.
title: Fury Pro Grappling 6
